title: Drawing, "Design for Blockprinted Textile with Medallions"
description: Imprinted border, hand colored [?] in red-brown, green, and mustard yellow: floral forms in large and medium size circles arranged in two vertical rows, with 4-petal medallions between circles.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Blockprinted Textile with Medallions".
Gouache on white paper. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-394.
